name: qmcgaw/gluetun
description: VPN client with rolling release model (latest-only)

test_cases.notes: Should use digest comparison, not semantic versioning. Old v3.x.x tags are abandoned.

:latest is the only actively maintained tag

override_config.reason: Maintainer abandoned semantic versioning in favor of :latest
